game.name: Schizo Dark
game.shortDescription: Schizo Dark is a survival horror game where you play as a detective investigating disappearances, encountering nightmares, monsters, and terrible secrets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Schizo Dark is a survival horror game where you play as a detective investigating disappearances, encountering nightmares, monsters, and terrible secrets.

reviewHighlights.text: [b]Playing this game I had a heart attack, a nervous breakdown and even died.[/b] It's actually not that bad. The game really makes you tickle your ne...
